channel.description: Recent content in Latest News on Westminster Astronomical Society

item.title: Star Points for June 2021
item.description: Partial Solar Eclipse at Sunrise June 10 You might want to start looking for those eclipse glasses you squirreled away from the great 2017 solar eclipse.

item.title: Star Points for May 2021
item.description: Up and Away Into the Wild Butterscotch Yonder Space art of the Martian surface from the 1950s and 1960s often depicted the planet with a beautiful blue Earth-like sky.

item.title: Pretty-print dates
